epicminesweeper.logic

Class Node

  • java.lang.Object
    • epicminesweeper.logic.Node

  • public class Node
extends Object
    Manages a single tile. Knows if tile is bomb, knows how many tiles next to it are bombs. Can be printed correctly for a text-based game.
    Author:
    Julius Uusinarkaus
